description: Smartloft midlayer line is built to keep you comfortable when you’re out in the elements. The interior Merino wool lining of the Men's Smartloft 60 Vest will help move sweat from your body while it’s still a vapor, and the filler wool will help insulate to keep you warm. The wind-resistant nylon shell is DWR-coated, to repel what the weather throws your way. To enhance your high-energy, cold-weather adventures, be sure to include this men’s vest.
name: Smartwool Smartloft 60 Vest - Mens
